export const BASE_URL = 'https://corebiz-test.herokuapp.com/api/v1/'; // regex found on --> https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5342375/regex-email-validation

export const emailRegex = /^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;
